mapper.delete: /*상품코드에 따른 구매 삭제 */ DELETE o FROM tb_goods AS g INNER JOIN tb_order AS o ON g.g_code = o.o_g_code WHERE g.g_seller_id = #{memberId};
mapper.select: /*회원별 회원정보 조회*/ SELECT m.m_id ,m.m_pw ,m.m_name ,m.m_level ,m.m_email ,m.m_addr ,m.m_reg_date FROM tb_member AS m WHERE m.m_id = #{memberId};

/* 회원 목록 조회 */ SELECT m.m_id AS memberId ,m.m_pw AS memberPw ,m.m_name AS memberName ,m.m_level AS memberLevel ,m.m_email AS memberEmail ,m.m_addr AS memberAddr ,m.m_reg_date AS memberRegDate FROM tb_member AS m;
